mzMLb¶

mzMLb is an HDF5 container format wrapping around the standard rich XML-format for raw mass spectrometry data storage, mzML. Please refer to 1 for more information about mzMLb and its features.

This module’s goal is to provide an identical interface to psims.mzml for writing the same content.

  • Writing mzMLb Documents
    • mzMLb Compression Methods

References¶

1

Bhamber, R. S., Jankevics, A., Deutsch, E. W., Jones, A. R., & Dowsey, A. W. (2021). MzMLb: A Future-Proof Raw Mass Spectrometry Data Format Based on Standards-Compliant mzML and Optimized for Speed and Storage Requirements. Journal of Proteome Research, 20(1), 172–183. https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.jproteome.0c00192
